🕵️‍♂️ **Data Detective**  
👨‍🎓 MS in Machine Learning and Data Science @ [Northwestern University](https://www.mccormick.northwestern.edu/machine-learning-data-science/)  

## About Me

Passionate data detective with hands-on experience in data science team projects. Dedicated to bridging business needs with technical expertise and business acumen, utilizing data to support evidence-based decisions.

### Why "Data Detective"?

I love reading Sherlock Holmes! I appreciate his ability to unravel mysterious cases through the observation of subtle clues and making shrewd deductions. In the era of big data, I am dedicated to bridging business needs with technical expertise and business acumen to unearth valuable insights from complex datasets, ultimately utilizing data to support evidence-based decisions.

> "It is a capital mistake to theorize before you have all the evidence. It biases the judgement." — Sherlock Holmes

## Interests

Efficient Deep Learning Computing, Multimodal Learning
